name: Galeforce
description:
Description

Galeforce is a 2D Arcade beat-em-up game, fight your way through waves of enemies and storm the castle. 

This game is still in development and will be updated if I can find the time.

Bio

Hi, Im Christian, a first year Game Art student at Media Design School in Auckland, New Zealand. If you wish to contact me please leave a comment or send an email to christian.itch.io@gmail.com
